app_descript:
App Name: iwee - Live Video Chat

Brief:

iwee is an engaging live video chat application that lets you connect with friends and users across the globe through real-time video calls. Designed for seamless communication, iwee comes equipped with a host of features like instant messaging, a fun translator during video calls, and the ability to send virtual gifts.
